website_summaries.verdict: Delicious water with subtle fruit flavors. An all-natural, unsweetened option that's ideal for consumers who want thirst-quenching water with a bit of fruity flavor and nothing else.
pros: Lives up to the brand's name with hints of flavors from non-GMO fruits
no sweeteners, and is made with purified water
Comes in numerous flavors, including a variety pack with pineapple, cherry, watermelon, and blackberry waters
cons: Some consumers prefer flavored waters with bolder fruit taste
Pricey, especially considering the bottles are a bit smaller than competitors we considered

customer_reviews.title: Propylene glycol—ALLERGIC
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to read about the court case of California and Hint for no disclosure of high amounts of propylene glycol under the “natural ingredients” coverup labeling. I’m allergic to that ingredient! And to drink this water believing I’m doing good for myself and children only to find out it’s causing me nonstop symptoms is very ANNOYING ! I did contact the company and the fact that someone started to answer but never did and the symptoms was confirmation of the guilt. Won’t be buying again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: These are so nasty! They leave a horrible aftertaste because they use oil to flavor them and it stays with you. The watermelon doesn’t taste anything like a watermelon...maybe watermelon rind but who knows. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: BlazerMomma

customer_reviews.title: My hubby's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I order Hint every 2 weeks for my husband that hates water and hates flavored water. This is the only water he drinks. He even bought infused bottles to try to replicate the light taste of this water. I know it's not the right thing but he reuses the bottles one time. It still has a fruit taste and the bottles are very strong. In the summer, he freezes thus water and keeps it poolside. It's very refreshing with icy bits.
customer_reviews.author: americancarol

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing water; description inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Hint has actually turned me into a water drinker! Just the perfect amount of infused flavor! 5 stars for that! The only complaint I have is that, before ordering, I studied the flavor combinations. I chose this one because of the cherry and blackberry flavors...especially the cherry. Sadly, the combination included crisp apple instead of cherry. (2 stars for that) I wouldn’t have ordered this combination had the description been correct. In an online shopping world, accurate descriptions are critical. Avg score 3.5, but I gave it a 4 because it really has a nice hydrating flavor.
customer_reviews.author: SpokAnne

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why there are so many positive reviews, even though the bottle claims al natural flavors, these thigs are the worst tasking 'water' I have ever had. they have some chemical taste I can not identify but they are just horrible. would just like to say, who adds 'other flavors' to water that is supposed to be 1 flavor, read the bottles, i.e. cherry water has cherry and other natural flavors. whatever these other flavors are produce a horrible taste to the water. save yourself some money and buy yourself a Britta filter pitcher if you want fresh tasting water
customer_reviews.author: gloria musgrovenelson

customer_reviews.title: When they say a hint they mean it.
customer_reviews.text: I let 4 of my friends try this with me to see if they could guess the flavor. None of them could. Tasted just like straight up water to us all. Not at all what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lmonte

customer_reviews.title: Love HINT Water
customer_reviews.text: I really like Hint Water. The lack of sugars or sugar substitutes or artificial flavors is the reason I tried it to begin with. Good Job Hint, Inc. My only objection to the options offered on Amazon is that I’m locked into a selection/mix of flavors that are not my favorite. Would much prefer to be able to purchase specific flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: No flavor
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with Amazon with delivery. Amazon is great. I have tried several vitamin waters and other brands. This brand tasted like water no flavor. Says it has a hint of flavor??? That's it a HINT
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a water drinker and have no problem drinking more than the required daily recommendation. I tried Hint out of curiosity, and although I liked the watermelon and pineapple flavors, I cannot reconcile the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Listener and Reader

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it just doesn’t hold up to the promise.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a variety case and I am hugely disappointed. I am not positive why the product is called Hint, since I still have to discover that hint of flavor. I would have been better suited to use one of the hint empty bottles and turn on the tap.
customer_reviews.author: NDD

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst water I have ever tasted. The smell when you open the bottle is deceiving. When you finally take a drink its literally plain water. Oh and the after taste is terrible! I have never had water dry my mouth out before. It was a feeling I cant even describe. The best thing to do to replicate this flavored water is take some kool aid in a glass dump it out and add regular water with out washing the glass out. Same thing.
customer_reviews.author: _shutter_locked_

customer_reviews.title: Tastes foul
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst tasting liquid I have ever had the misfortune to taste. No matter which flavor you try, you get the same overwhelmingly foul taste as if you are drinking poor quality sewage. After trying a taste of each of the flavors. I used it to water the plants. It has not killed them yet, but this is way too expensive to buy for watering your plants. Unfit for human consumption.
customer_reviews.author: John Shannonhouse

customer_reviews.title: BARELY A HINT
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS REALLY NO HINT OF FLAVOR IN THIS WATER. I WAS IMPRESSED BY THE HINT COMMERCIAL ON TV, WHICH LED TO MY PURCHASE. AS A RESULT, I EXPECTED A STRONGER TASTE OF FLAVOR. I THINK THE NAME OF THE DRINK IS OVERSTATED. HOWEVER, I LIKE WATER AND I WILL DRINK WHAT I HAVE PURCHASED, BUT NEVER AGAIN. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Errol B. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: The low quality taste of the water used overwhelms any good thing about this water...
customer_reviews.text: Horrific drink... The water tastes so bad. Doesn't taste filtered, or a quality of a spring water resource... The hint of flavor is overwhelmed by the low quality taste of the water packaged. This is a throw away product; and will never buy this again in any flavor...
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product, however the variety pack I ordered made me realize that this was going to be far more of a "meh" relationship. I tried the blueberry first and thought, "wow, this is pretty good" - I could actually taste a hint of blueberry, And it went downhill from there. The other flavors were non-existent. Happy I only paid $9 for the 12-pack. I'll stick to Zero Water going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Stare

customer_reviews.title: Has no taste at all....
customer_reviews.text: When they say "Hint" the really mean it. The is absolutly no flavor
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the product advertised....
customer_reviews.text: eh.... can’t see how this product could help someone who loves soda ween off. The flavor is so slight that its like drinking a watered down flavored water from walmart. If you are looking for something to ween you from soda, like the advertising claims, this is not the product imo. But for flavored water for serious water drinkers who want just a “hint” of flavor this is your product.
customer_reviews.author: Lovebites

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these singly in the grocery store. The price was great (it has since gone through the roof as a single purchase) and the flavor was an answer to a long-awaited wish. I have been looking for years off someone to do just this. No caffeine, no carbonation, no artificial sweetener or flavor, just a fresh hint of flavor as a break from water. The taste was great! Well, apparently quality control is not consistent because - with one of two (out of 12) exceptions, these tasted like slightly tainted water. I cancelled my subscribe and save :(
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Bitter water
customer_reviews.text: This water is horrible. Just a hint of flavor is true but you can't taste the flavor, just a slight smell of fruit. A complete waste of money. I would describe the water as tasting bitter whether cold or room temperature. If you want to try this water, but a single bottle first or you might have 11 extra bottles that you have no desire to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: Loved Hint Water
customer_reviews.text: I love the hint water and was on auto delivery but recently cancelled my subscription due to price increase after doing subscription service. I signed up for the subscription service at the rate of $8.73 per case of 12 because I was getting 2 cases every 2 weeks. Suddenly they raised the price to $17.76 per case of 12 without any notice. A little increase would have one thing, but double the price is a little much. Not cool for a company to do. With that I'm done with my purchase of Hint water.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Plain Water
customer_reviews.text: No flavor in my water. I'll buy water at Walmart much cheaper and add my own fruit. Very disappointed with this purchase. I cannot believe the price on this. Thought I was getting flavored water but NO
customer_reviews.author: shadow

customer_reviews.title: ... the price of this water the taste wasn't that great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this water the taste wasn't that great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is good! Yes, the scent of the fruit is stronger than the taste, but I didn't want a sweet lot of juices from fruits! It gives the water a wonderful edge! I can't buy this weekly, at the price, but definitely will each time I'm able!! Pineapple..yum! 😊 (I purchased the assortment, loved them all)
customer_reviews.author: KimberKat

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Very very little fruity taste. I'm sure it is healthy, just like plain water which is what this basically tastes like. Save money and be healthy bb drinking regular,plain water. Also way too expensive, especially when the price changes all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful AND BPA & Sugar Free!
customer_reviews.text: A hint of of fabulous flavor! For those who don't like to drink water, THIS will encourage you to hydrate! I feel it is a little pricey, but those that are less expensive do not have full flavor. Granted....it IS a hint of flavor, it is a hint of FULL flavor! I am one who does not like to drink water, but THIS is making a difference in my life! I am 64 years old, I believe this product WILL extend my life simply by virtue of the fact that without water, you will not have a full and long life! I love this product! Oh, and the bottles are BPA free!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Gaia Suzanne Edmiston, Psychic Medium

customer_reviews.title: Not much more then a hint.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these exact flavors directly from Hint when I saw their ad spamming on Facebook. I was a little disappointed. I was expecting at least some flavor. I could smell the flavors when I opened the bottle, but I couldn't taste anything. If it had a few hints more of flavor I would probably purchase again. Update: I Change my mind. I have tried a number of different flavors now and really enjoy it, especially after trying a few other brands that were either just too sweet or had garbage in them. I just put in a new order. Moral of the story, stick with it. Simple, crisp and refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: R. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Honestly at first it was a little pricey for me. I was fruit infusing my own water but it isn't all that convenient. So I got these and they taste great! I'm pregnant and they are the perfect amount of flavor (not too overwhelming) and not sweet but flavorful enough to be interesting. Very natural tasting. Like infusing your own water with no hassle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and economical
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I love this water. It is exactly what I was looking for - no carbonation, no sweetener, just flavor. The fruitiness comes through perfectly and somehow it also adds just a teeny tiny bit of natural sweetness. I love the pineapple the best but the blackberry, watermelon and cherry are good too. The only one I don’t like so far is the crisp apple. It is a very unusual flavor. The price is really good too.
customer_reviews.author: gail mann

customer_reviews.title: Literally a HINT of flavor
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it is a little expensive ... especially when you can buy plain water for cheaper. But if you’re like me who struggles to drink regular water this is perfect. The flavor is literally a HINT. It is not strong with flavor at all but enough to where you know it’s there and you’re not drinking regular water. It has no sugars or preservatives which is nice because sometimes I’d try and cheat and use a flavor packet or the liquid drops to the water but that’s defeating the purpose of the water. Even though it’s expensive, I have ordered more because I know my body will drink more of it
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: FLAT...FLAT
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I opened was flat as the head of a nail. No fuzz whatsoever. I've had Hint before and it was great. So disappointed that I have 11 more bottles at home that are probably flat as well. Money wasted
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon H. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not even a HINT of flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking flavored waters of all kinds and brands for a couple of years now, and this is the worst one I've tried. From reading the description on the bottle, it said there was an "essence" of flavor. I think that's more accurate as there certainly was NOT hint of flavor and I gave the rest of them away after trying two "flavors" and not being able to drink either one because there is actually NO flavor...not even a hint. Might as well save the money and drink tap water rather than Hint.
customer_reviews.author: Purrfect Storm

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this water. The flavor is almost non-existent so it's almost like drinking regular water. I made the order through subscribe and save and cancelled the next order. I plan to give it to my grandkids who usually drink regular water so this product will be perfect for them. I would say that if you've never had this product but want to try it, don't do it with subscribe and save. Try it first. Everyone is different. For me, this flavored water doesn't compare to Propel or Zero and it costs much more than those waters.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Great G'Ma

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wating to try this for a long time because of the reviews and I couldn't find it anywhere so I ordered a case. Biggest mistake I made. It taste horrible! It taste like flat water!!
customer_reviews.author: teamroper

customer_reviews.title: Hint 🍍🍒🍉blb
customer_reviews.text: Hint water variety packs arrived in good condition. I haven't drank any yet, but it's Hint... Need I say more. I love it and will continue to seek the best price. This is a good way to receive if you live where alternative food choices are few. Three of the four are on my hits list and I can enjoy the fourth one too. When you buy two and nothing else, they come in one box with no problems. I bought 4, two boxes, very happy to fill the fridge with Hint!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced water
customer_reviews.text: There is not even a “hint” of flavor in this water making it just overpriced bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Q

customer_reviews.title: Water with a Hint of Flavor. Simple.
customer_reviews.text: When I finally discovered this calorie free, sodium free, chemical free, tasty water I knew I found my healthy alternative. Not always available at my local supermarket so I tried Amazon, and there it was! And I could get it in mixed flavors! Delivered! The water is simple, filtered water with a hint of flavor (Hence, the name) and no artificial anything. No carbonation, no sugar, nothing but pure water and a hint of fruit flavor. I love them all and I was a die hard soda drinker. Now healthy is within my reach. Absolutely recommend this product to all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I struggle alot with drinking water so I was looking foward to drinking this water. I personally did not like it because it has an after tastes after you drink the water. The taste was so weird. I decided to just mix gatorade with water and use that for my water since it has a better taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: First and last time purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried "hint" for the first time. The closest this beverage came to pineapple was the picture of it on the wrapper. The label says the bottle "contains no juice". I totally agree with that but I have my doubts about whether or not it contains purified water or anything else edible. ( By the way - package and bottles all use the name "hint" in lower case not as cited in the title above in upper case (Hint). Even the manufacturer is doubtful as to its position in the H2O market.)
customer_reviews.author: Lthn

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Take into consideration as you read this that we are used to drinking rural well water. I'm not a fan of this stuff, and I believe it is because of the filtered water. With the pineapple flavor I experienced an unusual after taste. The only flavor that I found that I could half way tolerate was the blackberry, and even that was stretching it. I saw the advertisements for this on the tv and thought that they might be a good alternative to drink when we travel. They were not in my opinion. I wasn't happy with these, but then again I'm not used to drinking filtered water.
customer_reviews.author: SquarePeg

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: This is basically bottled water in a fancier plastic bottle with a colorful label. None of the 4 flavors in this assortment have even a HINT of flavor---just a faint scent of whatever fruit is pictured on the label. Once all 24 bottles are gone (which may last a month, because they'll be my LAST choice of whatever's cold), I'll switch back to water filtered through our reverse osmosis system & add liquid or powdered flavoring (Wyler, Splash, Mio, et al). Any of those are 500% more enjoyable, at 90% LESS cost than "hint"!
customer_reviews.author: pjc

customer_reviews.title: Just discusting...variety pack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the variety pack, all of the flavors are gross. I would compare this water to - having water from a cup that previously had juice in it. You rinse your cup out but you still taste that hint of juice. Just discusting...
customer_reviews.author: KittyClawsPuppyPaws

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This water is marketed as being vegan, non GMO and free of sweeteners, MSG and preservatives. I was shocked to learn it contains propylene glycol which is a synthetic solvent. I thought this was a natural product but it’s not. If you’re looking for flavorful water, this is not for you. As the name suggests, there’s only a hint of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think the water they use is pure.
customer_reviews.text: If mixed with ice and water from our home it Is very good. I had a bottle of a couple different flavors and enjoyed them but my stomach acid level increased like I was drinking water from north Pennsylvania. Water from there gives my wife and I stomach issues. After I mentioned the problem my wife said she had the same issue with it. I ended up giving our daughter the whole case we had on hand. She lives in north PA and really likes the product. I only drink Poland Springs water for the same reason. Other waters cause me the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: David W Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Water out of a garden hose has better flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike plain water and have been trying various flavored water products for a couple weeks trying to figure out which ones have the best flavor along with the best "bang for your buck" These are not it. You get a faint smell of what the flavor of the water is supposed to be upon opening it, but if there is any taste in this water, it's an aftertaste and often is unpleasant. The watermelon flavor tasted like the rind of the watermelon. Literally, I could have simply bottled water from my garden hose and would have had a better experience. Heck, I probably could have bottled some garden hose water and sold it on Amazon like these people did.
customer_reviews.author: Theskyroad

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like them at all. No one in my family likes them. That does not mean you won't like them though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: No flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is awful! I was looking for something to replace the Propel variety pack and this isn't it. The only one that had any flavor at the end of what tasted like tap water was the black berry and you have to really look for that flavor. will not buy again, i can get tap water out of the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Drinking much more water
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot more water since I discovered Hint. Some flavors are barely tasted but I still keep drinking. Its purified water. Some women can drink water from the faucet or a filter pitcher from the refrigerator I do not like cold, icy beverages. Room temperature or a hot beverage is my preference. I keep a variety of Hint water in the garage and the pantry so it's easy to grab on the run. I dislike all the plastic bottles I recycle. I would love jugs of Hint water to pour into my insulated reusable bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Tap water taste w/ fruit fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Expensive water that tastes like tap water with hint of fruit fragrance. I opened the watermelon & sniffed a wiff of watermelon (smelled good). Then took a sip & nothing, there was no taste of watermelon or anything else. Also tried the Pineapple with the same result. Personally neither my Dad nor myself really cared for this fruit infused water.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love Hint water. Although I’m not too happy the price has gone up! It’s difficult to find in stores and those that carry it seem to sell out quickly. Hint water is just about the only thing I drink. The flavor is very subtle but enough that your water isn’t boring. There isn’t any sugar (artificial or natural) added to the water either so it’s great for those who are watching out for those things. I highly recommend trying Hint water if you haven’t already.
customer_reviews.author: Khristy Strange

customer_reviews.title: Yay a little flavor no sweeteners and no bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Hint waters are one of the best Waters hey have created in a long time.I cannot stand the baking soda taste of the sparkling Waters and it is so difficult to find a flavored water that does not have any sweeteners artificial or otherwise that actually has a little bit more flavor than just water. the waters come in many flavors that I really like such as the pineapple blackberry strawberry kiwi and the watermelon. I cannot stress enough the fact that these Waters have taste natural flavor and no sweeteners which is an awesome combination that is difficult to find in the marketplace.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Corby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get my water drinking done!! I really don’t like water and I don’t like any of those carbonated waters. But these Hint waters taste great. And I don’t have to worry about what else might be in it. It is just a hint of a fruit flavor and that’s enough. I really like the pineapple and the black cherry flavors the best. I just wish I could get it at Walmart. I have ordered these from amazon several times and they arrive quickly
customer_reviews.author: Tara Aycock

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste! My favorite drink!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best infused water product on the market! I love the hint of the fruit taste without any weird additives. I can can’t stand the taste of artificial sweeteners and give a metal taste in my mouth. These are all natural and taste great. I love every flavor and now set up a subscription to make sure I receive a case each month. These are my go to drink when I head out for the day. Keeps me from stopping at a fast food place for a high sugar drink. Hope these never go out of stock! Customer for life. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Traycie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Please Consider before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Hint Water is Good , had to minus a star coz these don’t have any Expiration dates on them .? Please if you want your Customers to buy these bottles, consideration Valid Expiration dates on all bottles. Apple , Lemon Hint Water are a few of my Favorite. These have zero Sugar, no Sweetners just fruit Essence and Water **Update** Hint Water used to be $10 now $16 Very Unfair Bussiness
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Water with flavor- Not flavored water
customer_reviews.text: This is water with a “hint” of flavor. This is not flavored water. Said a different way- this water is more like drinking water that you tossed a slice of fruit in. It is not fruit flavored water- it’s not strong tasting like drink powders. If you love water with real fruit then you’ll like this. If you prefer powder mix (propel, crystal light etc) you’ll probably hate it. Black cherry was my favorite flavor. Much better out of the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: There is no flavor what so ever.
customer_reviews.text: Neither myself or my wife finished a bottle because of the stale taste. We purchased the variety pack and each flavor tasted the same. Not one of the bottles had a smell of what they were supposed to be infused with. We have had several different brands of flavored/infused water drinks but these are just horrible. We ended up dumping them out. I don't know how they could be reviewed so hi and what we got was so bad. Maybe ours were bottled with rinse water.
customer_reviews.author: Tooln

customer_reviews.title: The hint is the smell, not the taste
customer_reviews.text: This water is horrible. Lives up to its name though. There is only a hint of flavor. Commercials are misleading. Does not burst with flavor and taste more like the fruit. I’m glad I only purchased a smaller pack, I wish I could’ve gotten a single bottle instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Cross

customer_reviews.title: How Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of drinking water especially this 100 plus hot humid summer we are having. This is so good on Ice and better than soda with all the sugar it has and so healthy for you. On auto so I make sure I have this on hand for anyone that is wanting a different drink instead of water all the time. Packaged very well no damage to the bottles. Got variety pack for all the flavors. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this water
customer_reviews.text: I love this water! I have kidney disease and need to drink a lot of water but I get tired of plain water. I have tried many of the other flavored waters but they are usually much to sweet or they taste awful. I usually have one of these in the freezer and as it thaws just keep adding to it until the ice is gone. I just keep doing this day and night so i drink plenty of water now and enjoy it. I have even mixed a couple of the flavors together👍
customer_reviews.author: Dani M.

customer_reviews.title: Best water
customer_reviews.text: I love this water. I drink it everyday take it to work, to the gym and just drinking at home. Has no nasty after taste or weird flavor it’s just right like if you took the actual fruit and squeezed some in your water. I will be getting this delivered monthly. I love that I don’t have to carry my water bottles down to my fridge along with all my other groceries I get. I can just have this delivered so much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Love the water. Very refreshing and tasty. I will say when I first started drinking I didn’t taste the flavor as much more just a smell. I gave up sugar a while ago and once my taste buds adjusted these drinks now have big punch of flavor. If you are used to artificial sugar free or sugary drinks you will think there is almost no taste. It’s not the waters fault it’s your tastebuds wanting that highly saturated fake flavor.
customer_reviews.author: ZPTN615Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best drink to quench your thirst Substitute for Gatorade! Great for if you get sick!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I thought for sure no one would create a zero sugar water with no added sweeteners! I was wrong! I highly recommend this! It quenches you’re thirst! It’s best for anyone who doesn’t like drinking plain water and needs to drink water to keep hydrated! I’m sooo glad this was discovered! I used to drink Gatorade but the flavors gave me a taste that produced congestion! If you have allergies or sinus problems get away from them and drink this!! Sorry TMI but people can’t seem to find an ideal drink BUT this is it!!
customer_reviews.author: StacyLF

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I found an article (perhaps on Facebook?) that talked about the woman that started this company. I, too, hate the aftertaste artificial sweeteners leave. This is just water with a twist of cherry (or whatever flavor you buy) with no other frills, no carbonation, no sugars or artificial sweeteners or preservatives. The bottles are even BPA free! No wonder she's so successful, what a smart business woman! ZERO CALORIES! Need I say more? Oh, and I could smell the cherry before I tasted it. Neat, huh? I'm loving these, will be buying more.....
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Really odd
customer_reviews.text: Really odd, opened pack plastic, and one of the bottles in the center was 30% empty & seal broken. Employee was thirsty at HINT? Photo attached. Product okay, very light hint of flaring in smell, otherwise just nice plain water.
customer_reviews.author: inhughman

customer_reviews.title: It certainly has the perfect name.
customer_reviews.text: Hint is just what you get for flavor when you drink this. I don't expect to be overwhelmed with flavor like a soft drink but there is barely any flavor at all. It reminds me of when you drink a soda or other soft drink with ice in your cup. You have drank it all and there is just ice left. After letting the ice melt for awhile you take a drink and you get that really awful tasting watered down flavor of the soft drink. No thanks!
customer_reviews.author: coach316dc

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I EXPECTED the water to be fizzy. It is not, it's completely flat flavored water. After refrigerating, I put them in my soda stream and MADE them fizzy, after which I was much happier. The flavors are subtle and pretty tasty to far. Pretty sure I'll never again spend this much money on flavored water. I'd rather use lemon juice and stevia drops.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The hint is in the scent
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before ordering! I'm not a water drinker and was hoping this product would change that. The description "fruit infused," coupled with the advertising, gave me high Hope's. Unfortunately, this product did not live up to the hype. There's a slight hint of a fruity scent as you take the first sip. Other than that, the water is no different from what comes from my faucet. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good selection at a competitive price
customer_reviews.text: First, I really like Hint water. No calories, no sweetness (artificial or otherwise), just water with natural flavors. This is a great way to taste different flavors. And despite the weight, this package delivers on providing the bottles at a price competitive with local stores. If you're thinking of trying Hint, this is a great intro. And if you love Hint, this is a nice variety.
customer_reviews.author: xmarc999

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste good.  Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Flavors which only mildly resemble the fruit on labels. Blackberry has a particularly unpleasant aftertaste. Flavored seltzer manufacturers dona mich better job infusing club soda with natural flavors that actually taste pleasant. This product only sells because of effective marketing. Don't expect too many repwar buyers. Should be out of business relatively soon unless flavors are reformulated.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: A hard pass
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these waters, I originally bought them for my kids and they were not happy with it. My son even suggested tussin taste better than this water. I tried it for myself, they taste like chemical and that's difficult for me to overlook. I read a review that the chemical flavor is less intense when it's cold but I still tasted it. It felt like I was drinking dirty water from an unclean cup that had juice prior to. I guess my taste buds are not a fan artificial sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Joshi kun Mari

customer_reviews.title: My favorite infused water in the market!
customer_reviews.text: I first knew about Hint Fruit Infused Water from my work that provides a variety of favors in the office every day. As I have been work-from-home for about a month and I missed Hint Fruit Infused Water a lot, I then ordered a pack from Amazon. Watermelon and pineapple have been my all time favorite, therefore, I decided to purchase this variety pack. However, I have to give this pack a 4-star because I can't stand with the medicine kinda smell of the cherry flavor. Sorry Hint...
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: total hydration
customer_reviews.text: I have tried for years to find a flavored water that tasted good and did not have sugars, artificial sweeteners or artificial flavorings. I have FINALLY found it! I hate sodas and most bubbly drinks and cannot force myself to drink enough water through out the day but after tasting just one sip of Hint I was sold! Even if I just manage one bottle a day that's 16 more ounces than I would usually get but I am up to 3 bottles a day now and love the difference I am feeling in my skin, digestive system etc. THANK YOU BOLT.
customer_reviews.author: beardso

customer_reviews.title: Like all the flavors, just wish it was more cost effective.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water. Good natural flavor, light & doesn’t taste like aspartame such as other similar products. If it were a bit more cost effective I would purchase more often. They could probably make the bottle about an inch shorter while maintaining the same amount of product. This would cut manufacturing & consumer costs down. Overall I recommend this product & we very much enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZADDICT

customer_reviews.title: helps to get water in, recommend cold
customer_reviews.text: i don't like plain water, and this has a bit of flavor but is not overly sweet. there is a tinge of sweetness and it makes me wonder what the "natural flavors" are. its got a bit of an artificial taste to it, but overall i like it. still better than other drinks. i would recommend drinking it cold for it to be more refreshing. i've only tried watermelon and pineapple so far and enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: RxMomZ

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I already love water so I don't need a reason to drink it, but I also love soda and juice and am trying to move away from so much sugar. I tried hint water to see if it would help me find something with more taste but less sugar, and it works very well! It feels like I've treated myself to something sweet and yummy, so I don't crave sugary drinks on top of the plain water I already drink. I love that it's flat water since I hate bubbly water.
customer_reviews.author: Clarity Welch

customer_reviews.title: By Far The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the BEST water I’ve ever bought! That’s a lot of props cuz I’ve bought ALOT of different kinds of water. The taste is natural, not sweet with only an effervescent of fruit. The watermelon is by far my favorite!! Highly highly recommend this natural water.
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best flavored water, No BS ingredients. It's pricey, but if everyone buys it, cost will come down.
customer_reviews.text: The best part is they don't add a lot of other ingredients to flavor their water like the big companies do. (Some other companies even put in artificial sweeteners and call it water.) Mist water has done everything right on all of the flavors and the only negative I can think of is they are a little bit on the pricey side for just water and a little teeny bit of essence of fruit flavor. Other than that I hope other people become fans because I would hate to see this go away. It's an easy way to drink lots of water even if you don't like water. Anyone who's tried this will like it.
customer_reviews.author: dennis hickoy

customer_reviews.title: Want a hint?  Buy this if you’re not a good water drinker.
customer_reviews.text: Hint water is amazing. If you can get it for $1 per bottle it’s even more amazing. Hint water has allowed me to drink water more than I ever have in my life. I’m not a fan of regular water. It’s not flavorful. Hint has a variety of flavors in this pack. My favorites are blackberry and cherry water. They are infused with these fruits with just the right amount of essence of fruit. Hint makes drinking water fun and easy to drink the recommended glasses of water each day.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L

customer_reviews.title: Thought I'd try it...
customer_reviews.text: Kept seeing the commercial and wanted some. Neighborhood supermarket had 10 for $10 all the same flavor. Amazon was the only place I could get them for less than $1 each and with the mixed flavors, so that was great. I wish I could say the same about the product itself. It was refreshing and yes, when they say a hint they mean a hint. Might as well just drink regular water... That's just my opinion though.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to just plain water.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like drinking water with flavor. Lol. That’s exactly what it is. No added sugars, which I really like. Drinking water is so boring. The flavor makes me want to drink more. Will be ordering some more. My only complaint is that I received two packages, one was a variety of flavors and the other was all apple. Wished it was mixed for both packages.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey3589

customer_reviews.title: True hint of flavor
customer_reviews.text: I usually watch for these to be on sale at Sam's Club. I bought here because with this pandemic, I have been limiting my in-store times due to their extreme busyness. I'm glad I bought here, I tried the black cherry, and now may have a new favorite! The subtle hint of flavors are perfect when you're bored of "just" water! Each flavor is pleasant, have been adding to my smoothies as well.
customer_reviews.author: punkrock13

customer_reviews.title: Light and refreshing. No sweeteners! Awesome for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These were way cheaper online than in stores so win-win there! It has nothing but water and a little hint of flavor so no weird sweetener after taste which I love. It tastes like you let strawberries or watermelon sit in a pitcher for a while and then strained it. Perfect hint of refreshing flavor. Pineapple does taste slightly metallic but my husband didn’t notice so it could be preference
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely wouldn't buy again.  Not enough of a "hint"
customer_reviews.text: I truly admirer what this company is trying to achieve, and I was very hopeful I would like this product. However, the flavors are terrible. Barely noticeable. Just enough to make it taste like water the is a bit off. Extremely disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: FAIRFAX, VA

customer_reviews.title: NEVER GOING BACK
customer_reviews.text: Hint water is my new favorite water. I think my tastebuds have even adjusted to it. I noticed it’s thinner than Ice Mountains bottled water, but that may be because of the infusion. Overall, it’s bomb. I’ll continue to drink it. Thank you to the founder /lady who pushed for this product !
customer_reviews.author: Keni Nichele

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, LOVE this water.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's difficult to drink all the water I should, but not with Hint water! It is so pure -- no chemicals. Just a hint of the flavor shown on the water. I love almost all the flavors with the exception of the lemon. It tastes a bit "off" to me, but it might just be me. Watermelon, Cherry, etc. are all SO good. I buy lots of flavors, and it really doesn't matter which one I grab out of the fridge. Btw, this is not sparkly water. I prefer this. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Don't Subscribe to !
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the hint of flavor. Could offer more variety in the package. But will not subscribe to this product. One June 11th price was $10.38 next month July 1 price was $14.01 my August 16th shipment is to be $17.76 This is total a rip off. If a subscription is offered the price should remain the same for a period of time this is not a subscription. This should read Auto Ship at current price?
customer_reviews.author: Miss Gee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The positive reviews on this go to show that not everyone has the same taste buds. These are nasty and they leave a chemical tasting aftertaste. A complete waste of money in my opinion. No one in my household likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not really any flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with the taste. Not much flavor and what there was was horrible. It was better if very cold and it was the first drink or the day but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: The water has just a hint of flavor not very strong but the cap is almost impossible to get off!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the water had just a hint of flavor would have liked it a little stronger. I did not like the fact that the cap is so hard to open. I had to take a butter knife to it break the seal then put the knife under the top and let a little air in so the bottle would open. It does have a very had to open cap especially if you wrist is not strong. Flavor is okay. I would as I said above liked it to be a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: tink

customer_reviews.title: Love This Water
customer_reviews.text: First thing that I want to say is that I am not a "water-drinker". I have never enjoyed drinking plain water. I have tried several other types of flavored waters, as well as water additives. To me, they have all been way to sweet. However, this water is delicious. It literally has just a hint of flavor...enough to add flavor, but not overwhelming. I am now officially a lover of water!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy agian, didn't care for the flavors.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try hint water. Amazon had a great buy at 1$ per bottle. packaged great, but i will not be ordering this product again. The flavor tasted fake. I think I'd rather save the plastic bottles and make my own with a piece of fruit in them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Waste  of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest rip off I have ever tried. The only "HINT" of flavor is located on the "fruit" picture on the bottle. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. You can make a better bottle of water with the juice of a Dole Pineapple bowl the "all natural" juice bowl. I about laughed when I read it was "spa" quality! This is going down the drain .
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: The BEST water alternative I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time drinking enough water because I just can't motivate myself to drink it. This literally tastes like purified water with just a "hint" of flavor. Like putting a squeeze of lemon in water or water that has fruit in it. There are No sweeteners, colorings, or artificial flavors. With the monthly subscription, it's less than $1 a bottle, which is cheaper than buying it directly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: HAD ONE OF THESE FROM A DRUG STORE
customer_reviews.text: When I saw it on Amazon, I ordered a dozen bottles. Just a hint (get it?) of nice fruit flavor and a convenient size bottle in heavier plastic. Wide mouth accepts skinny ice cubes from my refrigerator ice maker. UPDATE: Still love the water, but will order exclusively from Amazon from now on, since the price is double from the manufacturer, which runs a flim-flam bogus offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hint is just what they mean
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these are not overly flavored. A hint is just what you get. Granted, some flavors are better than others in my opinion, but overall, I like all of these. I've tried some of the other flavors not included in this pack and some were very good, some not so much. The price here is also a few bucks cheaper than the Hint site, so it's a win.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reaux

customer_reviews.title: Not enough flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like hint but watermelon is the only one with a strong enough flavor. The cherry has some flavor but the other two pretty much taste like plain water, which makes it not really worth it for me. I have been drinking Hint off and on for years. I don't really understand the fluctuations in flavor intensity lately. I will just stick with the watermelon one.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Doh

customer_reviews.title: love this water
customer_reviews.text: I love this water! I am not a water fan so I get this so I will drink water. This is my lifesaver. p.s. Amazon shipping...the box barely made it intacted. the top tape was ripped off and the bottom almost fell out.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Water haters rejoice
customer_reviews.text: I hate water. I do. I know it’s good for me but yuck! Hint Water has changed my view of water. I drink much more water these days. I find the odd aftertaste of regular water, whether bottled, filtered or out of the tap, unpleasant. This has no odd aftertaste. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: LilMrs

customer_reviews.title: I Wanted to Love All of the Flavors, but I Didn't
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Variety 12 pack and enjoyed the Cherry and Blackberry, but found the Pineapple and Watermelon flavor were too faint. The Cherry and Blackberry tasted fresh as if you expected to find the fruit in the bottle! The watermelon, in particular, was so faint I could barely taste it at all. I hope they improve this flavor as I love watermelon. The pineapple was just so-so. I will purchase the Cherry and Blackberry in the future. I do drink more water when I have Hint bottles in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Moonbeam929

customer_reviews.title: FLAVOR FLAVOR FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love what they have done with this water. The flavor doesn't overwhelm and comes out once it hits the back of your throat. Really love the product, but it literally cost more than a bottle of beer or double or triple the cost of a soda. Hmmm, I would rebuy this in a second if the price came down. I'm just not sure why it is priced so high with so many alternatives costing a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Watch The Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I’ve reviewed these drinks many times and still love them. No sweetness in any of these but subtle refreshing taste. You must watch pricing, when I can get a 12 pack delivered to my door for less than $15.00 I am all about it!
customer_reviews.author: TooBratty

product_meta.title: Hint Fruit Infused Water, Variety Pack, Cherry, Watermelon, Pineapple, Blackberry, 16 oz (12 Pack)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Best Sellers| *:WaterIt's water, just tastier. Drink fruit infused water with 0 calories and 0 sweeteners. It's a refreshing and healthy alternative to juice, soda and other sweetened drinks. Try hint's mouthwatering water today.
feature_bullets: Pure water: Our hint water variety pack has 12 bottles of perfect pure water combined with the subtle flavors of Cherry, Watermelon, Pineapple, and Blackberry: Nature's favorite refreshment elevated with zero calories, sugar, or diet sweeteners

Healthy substitute: Hint provides an affordable and healthy soda, juice, and energy drink substitute: It supports metabolism and immune system health by encouraging increased hydration with a subtle clean flavor: Hint beverages meet smart snack requirements

Pure and elegant: The purity of hint water and the elegance of light flavor, hint is a spa and gym quality hydration: Quenching your thirst with infused water, made with natural flavors and zero sweeteners that you don't have to lift a finger to enjoy

Natural refreshment: Hint water has zero: Sugars, Stevia, artificial sweeteners, preservatives, calories, artificial flavors, and GMOs: Natural, hepa compliant, and made in the USA: Nature's original refreshment; Drink water, not sugar

Hydrating burst: This unsweetened refreshment is great for a pre workout or post workout burst of hydration, or present it at your next dinner party as an elegant beverage, your guests will thank you for keeping their health in mind; Refreshing and healthy

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
